snippet: N.H.L. general managers will discuss whether to put the red line back into effect, making two-line passes illegal, as they were before the 2004-5 lockout.
abstract: N.H.L. general managers will discuss whether to put the red line back into effect, making two-line passes illegal, as they were before the 2004-5 lockout.

headline.main: Trying to Decide Whether to See Red
